SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro is the sole heir of the deadly 2000 year old martial art, Hokuto Shinken. He is on a quest for vengeance after being betrayed by a former friend, Shin, who mutilates Ken's body and steals his girlfriend Julia. Bandits and rival martial artists await him in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. Known as 北斗の拳 (Hokuto No Ken) in Japan, Ken le Survivant in France and Quebec and Ken il Guerriero in Italy. First Opening song: Ai o Torimodose Second Opening song: Tough Boy Closing song: Love Song
Aliases: Fist of the North Star: The Legends of the True Savior
New Fist of the North Star

1.SummaryEnglish: After a global-scale nuclear war, the majority of earth's surface has become a wasteland, with most of the world's survivors fighting over the few uncontaminated food and water supplies. Kenshiro, the master of the deadly martial art Hokuto Shinken, is traveling with his fiancee Yuria (Julia in English version) when they are confronted by Ken's former friend Shin of the Nanto Seiken. After defeating Ken in combat, Shin engraves seven stab wounds on Ken's chest and leaves him for dead, taking Yuria with him. Ken's eldest brother Raoh, having witnessed the fight without intervening, returns to his dojo and challenges his Master Ryuken's decision to choose Ken as his successor over him. Raoh kills Ryuken and proclaims he will become the ruler of the new world. A year passes and Ken is found wandering in the desert. He rescues a couple of young children named Bat and Lin from bandits. Afterwards he allies himself with another martial artist named Rei, a Nanto Seiken master who is searching for his sister Airi. Ken learns from Rei that his brother Jagi has been impersonating him in an attempt to tarnish his reputation and draw him out. Ken heads to Jagi's lair and defeats him. Before dying, Jagi reveals that he was one who convinced Shin to betray Ken and that he is now living with Yuria in his stronghold of Southern Cross. Elsewhere, Raoh has amassed a huge army, expanding his domain by defeating rival warlords and begins heading to Southern Cross. There Yuria is treated with a life of luxury, living under the rule of King Shin. However, Yuria refuses Shin's gifts of affection, longing to be reunited with Ken. When she overhears that Ken is still alive, she attempts to sneak out of the castle, only to be taken captive by Raoh, who challenges Shin to combat. A while later, Kenshiro arrives at Southern Cross, finding the city in flames and Shin's men dead. Shin is still alive and fights Ken, but the battle does not last long, as Shin was graveley wounded in his batt

2.SummaryEnglish: This anime adventure centers on Kenshiro, a loner who travels a post-apocalyptic landscape. He encounters the personal army of Sanga, a ruthless warlord who controls a city known as Last Land. Sanga maintains control with the help of an amnesiac mute child who performs card tricks and keeps the populace of the city frightened with his supposed powers. When Sanga attempts to consolidate his power, Kenshiro decides to stop him

3.SummaryEnglish: The Last Land has crumbled at the hands of Kenshiro, but in order to save the young Lord Doha, the powerful hero must travel through a land haunted by murderous demons in this sequel to the hit anime Fist of the North Star. Lord Doha has fallen ill, and if he doesn't receive a rare serum within a few short days he will certainly die. Though the serum is a two-day trip in both directions, Sara reveals that there is a shorter path running through Cliffland but it is haunted by vicious demons. As Kenshiro bravely makes way for the dreaded Cliffland, a new fighter named Seiji arrives in Last Land pursued by evil Clifflanders and vowing to reclaim Sanga's legacy.

4.SummaryEnglish: Destruction and betrayal take center stage in the latest installment of the New Fist of the North Star series. When Kenshiro returns to find the city in ruins and its citizens tormented, his pain is compounded when he is betrayed and imprisoned by Tobi. As Tobi prepares a brutal assault on Seiji, Kenshiro must summon all of his strength to break free and take put a halt to his former friend's destructive scheme

5.TitleEnglish: Legend of Raoh: Chapter of Death in Love
5.SummaryEnglish: A film adaptation of the Holy Emperor story arc, which primarily depicted the conflict between Kenshiro and Souther. New characters Reina, one of Raoh's army officers who falls in love with him, and her brother Soga, Raoh's advisor, play an important part with much of the plot involving Raoh's relationship with Reina as he conquers the land; most of this portion is new content exclusive to this film. The other side of the story is the retelling of Ken's attempt to save and protect the villagers from Souther's army with the help of Shū. There is also a small subplot of Bart returning to his home.

6.SummaryEnglish: This OVA features a somewhat original storyline because it presents the story from Yuria's perspective, spanning from her childhood, including the day she first met Kenshiro, to the conclusion of the previous film, as well as certain scenes from the manga and anime in which Yuria was not present. This story is the most expansive of the series, even covering never before seen events from Yuria's childhood, revealing both her mother and father, as well as her brother Ryuuga during his childhood. It also adds some details that were not in the manga, such as the time and place when Yuria developed her illness, her meeting with Rei (making his only appearance in the series), and her transition to the role of the Nanto General. One of the more notable additions is Yuria's dog Tobi, who serves an important role in the relationship between her and Ken. However, the OVA ends at the death of Souther and does not follow Yuria to the time of her death.

7.TitleEnglish: Legend of Raoh: Chapter of Fierce Fight
7.SummaryEnglish: A film adaptation of the Last Nanto General story arc from the manga, depicting the final battle between Kenshiro and Raoh that led to Kenshiro becoming the successor of Hokuto Shinken. Some events from the manga / anime have been excluded from the story (such as Raoh's fight with Juza) whereas others have been altered or expanded. New content featuring the final battle from Raoh's perspective have been added. This film serves as the follow-up to the first film in the series, which introduced Raoh and Reina's relationship, this time bringing it to a conclusion.

8.SummaryEnglish: An OVA which centers around Toki and his relationship with his brother Raoh, leading up to Toki's imprisonment in Cassandra and eventually his duel with Raoh. The OVA introduces another new character named Sara, a female doctor who watches over Toki and becomes his love interest.

9.SummaryEnglish: The film's story is a prequel to the Fist of the North Star depicting the one year interval between Kenshiro's defeat at the hands of Shin and their later battle. Unlike the others in the series this film has a completely original storyline in which Kenshiro, near death after his battle with Shin and having used his remaining energy to kill a pack of wolves, was captured by slavers. Due to his strength, Kenshiro could escape whenever he wanted, but chose to stay and protect the other slaves.

10.TitleEnglish: Hokuto no Ken - Legend of Heroes

11.TitleEnglish: Hokuto no Ken - Legend of Heroes 3D

1.SummaryEnglish:
Stagione 1 di Ken il guerriero in anteprima dal 11 ottobre 1984.

Alla ricerca di Shin.

La prima parte comprende gli episodi da 1 a 22, ovvero copre interamente la saga di Shin. Questa parte adatta i capitoli del manga da 1 a 25

1.TitleEnglish: God or Devil!? The Mightiest Man Who Appeared in Hell!
1.SummaryEnglish: After a long time wandering in the desert, Ken is taken prisoner while wandering into a village looking for water. There, he shares a cell with a young thief named Bato (Bart), and befriends his cell guard, an orphaned girl named Rin (Lynn). Shortly afterwards, a biker gang attacks the village and their leader Zeed takes Rin hostage. Ken breaks out of his cell and defeats Zeed, rescuing Rin. Ken leaves the village with Bato following him, while Rin stays behind.

2.TitleEnglish: The Zankai Ken Deathblow! The Future Is Sighted in the Barren Desert!
2.SummaryEnglish: Ken rescues an old man named Smith from Spade, a member of the Four Jacks working for the King organization. The old man seeks to deliver a bag of rice seeds to his village, hoping to harvest them for the future. Ken and Bato take Smith to his village, unaware that Spade and his men are following them. Spade, who lost his eye during his initial encounter with Ken, attacks the village and kills Smith in retaliation. Unable to rescue Smith, an angry Ken kills Spade with a technique that makes their victim feel remorse before dying. After the battle, Ken plants Smith's seed over his grave.

3.TitleEnglish: In a City Without Light, a Lone Fist Burns!
3.SummaryEnglish: Bato spots Rin in a truck full of captured villagers being taken to the village of Dorado, which is occupied by the King gang. On their way there, Ken encounters two of remaining Jacks, Diamond and Club, who are torturing the villagers of Dorado. With Bato's help, Ken is reunited with Rin.

4.TitleEnglish: Attack on the Bloody Cross! Secret Technique, Death by Soft Strikes!
4.SummaryEnglish: Ken learns that the prisoners that were transported with Rin were taken to a prison camp in a nearby valley. Ken manages to break the imprisoned villagers free, but during their escape they're all slaughtered in an ambush led by Mr. Heart, the last of the Four Jacks. While Heart's excess flesh proves resistant to his attacks, Ken eventually uses a techniques which penetrates through his body. From his battle with Heart, Ken learns an important clue which reveals to him the identity of King.

5.TitleEnglish: Can the Flames of Love Burn in Hell? You Are Already Dead!
5.SummaryEnglish: Having learned that King is none other than his old friend turned nemesis Shin, Ken remembers how a year ago Shin defeated him in combat, engraved the seven scars on his chest, and kidnapped his fiancee Yuria (Julia). Ken arrives at a local castle where Shin was staying, but only finds Shin's right-hand man Joker, who reveals that Shin and his gang has already left the castle, taking Yuria with him. Joker escapes and sets the castle ablaze with Ken inside, but Ken manages to escape, swearing to find Shin.

6.TitleEnglish: Search Order From Satan. Find the Man With the Seven Scars!
6.SummaryEnglish: Ken and his friends arrive at an oasis under the surveillance of God's Army, a fanatical military group composed of former special forces members. Ken becomes a target for this group after Ken kills one of the security officers in battle.

7.TitleEnglish: Villains! Shall We Have a Countdown to Death?
7.SummaryEnglish: The members of God's Army conduct a full-scale search of the oasis for Kenshiro. When the search team begins to execute random villagers to lure him, Ken allows himself to be captured in order to infiltrate their training facility. There, he faces against the army's drill instructor, the Mad Sarge.

8.TitleEnglish: Strike the Hidden Power Point! No Requiem for the Wicked!
8.SummaryEnglish: Ken penetrates the headquarters of God's Army and confronts their leader, the Colonel, a deluded follower of Shin who has mastered the art of Nanto Muonken.

9.TitleEnglish: Villains! Say Your Prayers Before You Die!
9.SummaryEnglish: Ken and his friends visit a village where young men and women are offered as slaves to Madam Patra, a local sorceress who controls the village's water supply.

10.TitleEnglish: The Raging Flame Reverse-Flow Punch! There Are Too Many Who Must Die!
10.SummaryEnglish: Ken ventures into Patra's lair at Dragon God Mountain to save the young villagers. There he faces Patra's partner Dragon, a firebreather who attempts to coerce Ken to his side.

11.TitleEnglish: Villains! Listen to the Blues of Hell!
11.SummaryEnglish: Ken and his companions meet Taki, an old friend of Bato. Taki takes them to his home village where Auntie Toyo, an elderly woman who takes care of orphaned and abandoned children, is trying to dig a well. Unaware to him, the Warriors biker gang led by Jackal have followed Ken, seeking to claim Toyo's village as their new hideout.

12.TitleEnglish: I Am Death! I'll Chase You to the Ends of Hell!
12.SummaryEnglish: After Toyo is killed by Jackal, Ken leaves Bato and Rin to watch over Toyo's orphans while he chases after Jackal's gang. While searching for clues to Jackal's destination, Ken encounters Fox, Jackal's right-hand man.

13.TitleEnglish: Arhat Deva Fist! Once Released, There's No Holding It Back!
13.SummaryEnglish: Ken chases Jackal to the ruins of Villainy Prison, a place that used to imprison the most vicious of criminals. Hoping to defeat Ken, Jackal releases Devil's Rebirth, a giant demon-like killer who has mastered the forbidden art of the Arhat Deva Fist.

14.TitleEnglish: A Miserable Age! Good People Die So Young!
14.SummaryEnglish: Ken and his friends visit a village where their local doctor, a man named Duran, offers his hospitality. However, Duran's former partner-in-crime, Dante, is hired by Shin to hunt down Ken. Dante takes the opportunity of the situation to blackmail Duran to do his bidding.

15.TitleEnglish: Count to Three! You're the One Who'll Die!
15.SummaryEnglish: Ken and his friend must save a haunted village from Zaria, a witchdoctor who uses a strange hypnosis technique that turns villagers into mind-controlled slaves.

16.TitleEnglish: Try to Sing, Villains! The Counting Rhyme of Hell!
16.SummaryEnglish: Ken is caught at the middle of a gang war between the Scorpions and the Snakes, each seeking to recruit Ken to their side.

17.TitleEnglish: Battle Makes a Man! The Gates of Confrontation Have Opened!
17.SummaryEnglish: Shin gathers his entire army for a meeting as he officially declares war against Kenshiro. Barcom, the General of King's army, tells his men how Ken defeated some of Shin's best fighters. Meanwhile, Yuria recounts to Saki how she came to be Shin's captive and his rise to power.

18.TitleEnglish: Life or Death? At the End of the Wilderness Lies the First Street of Hell!
18.SummaryEnglish: One of King's subordinate gangs attacks a village Ken is visiting, while Yuria attempts to escape from Southern Cross with the help of her young maid Saki.

19.TitleEnglish: Villains! Ready Your One-Way Tickets to Death!
19.SummaryEnglish: Ken is forced to return to Jeena village when Garekki of the Gold Wolf gang attempts to invade it, while Saki's elder brother, Temjina, escapes from Southern Cross, seeking to tell Ken of Yuria's whereabouts.

20.TitleEnglish: Nightmarish Full-Scale War! My First Packs One Million Volts!
20.SummaryEnglish: With Ken having learned the location of the city of Southern Cross from Temjina's dying words, Shin deploys a giant gunship as his last resource.

21.TitleEnglish: The Palace of Evil in Flames! Shin, Only One More Step to You Now!
21.SummaryEnglish: With Ken presumed dead, General Barcom leads a mutiny against Shin, seeking to take over the King gang for himself. Elsewhere, Joker searches the wreckage of the gunship for Ken's body, unconvinced that he is actually dead.

22.TitleEnglish: Conclusion of Chapter One: Julia Forever... As Well as Shin!
22.SummaryEnglish: With Southern Cross left in ruins following Barcom's revolt, Shin is left by himself in his own palace, protected by the few followers he still has left. Ken confronts Shin for the first time in a year and defeats him, only to learn that Yuria has already killed herself.

2.TitleEnglish: Hokuto e Nanto: Una storia millenaria
2.SummaryEnglish: Stagione 2 di Ken il guerriero in anteprima dal 28 marzo, 1985. Mamiya, Rei e la famiglia Cobra. Alla ricerca di Toki: Jagger, Amiba e la prigione di Cassandra. Il Re di Hokuto. Le sei stelle di Nanto: Yuda. La seconda parte comprende gli episodi dal 23 al 57, e va dall'incontro con Rei fino alla morte di quest'ultimo dopo il combattimento con Yuda. Questa parte adatta i capitoli del manga da 26 a 83.

1.TitleEnglish: Chapter Two: Stormy Times, Titanic Battles – Is Battle All That Awaits Me?!
1.SummaryEnglish: Ken is recruited to serve as guardian of a village threatened by the Fang clan and becomes acquainted with their female leader Mamiya, who is a deadringer for Yuria. Elsewhere, a man named Rei, master of the Nanto Suichōken style, is killing numerous bandits while seeking the Man with Seven Scars.

2.TitleEnglish: Nanto Suichoken! The Tragedy of the Mighty Begins!
2.SummaryEnglish: Rei is hired by the Fang Clan to infiltrate Mamiya's village as a spy, where he meets Ken and his friends. However, he becomes attracted to Mamiya and switches sides.

3.SummaryEnglish: When Mamiya's younger brother Ko is captured by the Fangs and publicly executed, Ken and Rei sets out to punish the ones responsible. Rei reveals his motive for searching for the Man with Seven Scars.

4.TitleEnglish: Tremble and Die! Villains of Night Fog Valley!
4.SummaryEnglish: Ken, along with Rei and Mamiya, venture into Night Fog Valley in order to confront Boss Fang, the leader of the Fang Clan. Boss Fang orders his right-hand man to do a background check on Ken and Rei.

5.TitleEnglish: Only Villains Can Smile! How I Hate This Age!
5.SummaryEnglish: Ken, Rei, and Mamiya arrive at Boss Fang's lair, only to find out that the gang has tracked down and captured Airi, Rei's long-lost sister.

6.TitleEnglish: Rei! I'll Wipe Your Tears Away With My Fists!
6.SummaryEnglish: While pretending to be Ken's fiancee, Mamiya allows herself to be captured by Boss Fang under the condition that he releases Airi. However, Boss Fang does not keep his side of the bargain and forces Ken and Rei to fight each other for the safety of the women.

7.TitleEnglish: It's Too Late for You to Beg for Your Life! To Hell With You, Boss Fang!
7.SummaryEnglish: Ken and Rei defeat the Fang Clan and rescue women. After to Mamiya's village, Airi regains her eyesight and reveals that the man who kidnapped her wore a metal helmet. Elsewhere, a vicious gang leader with seven scars on his chest is terrorizing a village, claiming to be Kenshiro himself.

8.TitleEnglish: Destiny Draws Near! Jagi, Who Are You?
8.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro learns that Jagi, an adoptive brother who was also trained in the art of Hokuto Shinken, is trying to tarnish his reputation by committing numerous heinous acts while claiming to be him.

9.TitleEnglish: The Hellish Iron Mask! He Who Terrorizes in the Name of the North Star!
9.SummaryEnglish: Enraged by the fact that his younger brother was chosen to be the heir to Hokuto Shinken, Jagi continues his rampage of destruction, destroying anyone who reminds him of Kenshiro. But when Ken finds out that Jagi isn't above using his abilities to exploit young children, he resolves that nothing will stand in the way of a long-awaited showdown with his brother.

10.TitleEnglish: The Four Linked Fists of Rage! Jagi, I'll Wait for You in Hell!
10.SummaryEnglish: Ken confronts his brother Jagi, who seeks vengeance against Ken, who was responsible for mutilating Jagi's head after failed attempt at killing Ken. During battle, Jagi reveals that he was the one responsible for convincing Shin to betray Ken

11.TitleEnglish: This Is the Village of Miracles! A Fallen Angel Has Descended!
11.SummaryEnglish: Ken hears rumors that one of his other Hokuto Shinken brothers Toki, a once benevolent healer, is now using his skills to experiment on people.

12.TitleEnglish: Toki! Are You an Angel or a Devil?!
12.SummaryEnglish: Ken confronts a group of hunters who were physically modified through pressure point experiments conducted on them by Toki.

13.TitleEnglish: Fiend! Toki, Your Heart Is Rotten to the Core!
13.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro confronts Toki in his lair at the Village of Miracles. However, Ken is unconvinced that his adversary is the real Toki, until he reveals the scar on his back, from which Toki gained while rescuing a young Kenshiro in the past.

14.TitleEnglish: I Have No Past to Look Back On! Just My Hatred for Evil That Will Destroy Toki!
14.SummaryEnglish: Rei and Mamiya arrive to help Ken, revealing that Ken's adversary is not the real Toki, but a former follower of his named Amiba, who had the real Toki imprisoned. Before dying, Amiba reveals that he is following orders from a man known as "Ken-oh".

15.TitleEnglish: Love, I Reject! For I Bear the Cursed Star of Death!
15.SummaryEnglish: Mamiya seeks clues to Toki's whereabouts and learns that he is imprisoned at the Dungeon of Cassandra, the City of Wailing Demons.

16.TitleEnglish: Crimson Orchid Mountain Fist! A Birth of a Tragic Woman!
16.SummaryEnglish: Uighur, the Warden of Cassandra, blackmails a female prisoner named Bella, the successor of the Ranzan Kurenaiken (the Crimson Fist of Lotus Mountain) style, to kill Ken and his friends.

17.TitleEnglish: A Heinous Legacy! The Gate to Cassandra Has Opened!
17.SummaryEnglish: The trio reaches the Gates of Cassandra, where they confront the gatekeepers Raiga and Fuga, the twin successors of the Nishin Fūraiken ("Two Gods of Wind and Thunder Fist") style.

18.TitleEnglish: Villains Need No Tombstones! This Is the Hellish Cassandra!
18.SummaryEnglish: Ken challenges Uighur, the Warden of Cassandra, at the prison's courtyard.

19.TitleEnglish: The North Star's 2000 Years of Tragedy! I Can Hear Ken-Oh's Footsteps!
19.SummaryEnglish: While awaiting for Ken's return, Bat and Rin reminisce of their adventures with Ken and the people they met up until this point. Ken-Oh's Royal Guards arrive at Cassandra to regain their hold of the prisoners' morale.

20.TitleEnglish: Century's End With No Tomorrow! Ken, I've Been Waiting for You!
20.SummaryEnglish: Ken and his allies fight their way against Ken-oh's Royal Guards into Cassandra, where Toki awaits him.

21.TitleEnglish: The Fall of Cassandra! The Myth of the North Star Is Rewritten!
21.SummaryEnglish: Ken finally finds Toki, who reveals that Ken-oh is none other than the eldest of the four Hokuto Brothers, Raoh.

22.TitleEnglish: The Death Omen Star Shines! Ken-Oh, Do You Control Even Death!?
22.SummaryEnglish: While on their way to Mamiya's village, Ken and Toki reveal more about their past with Raoh to her and Rei, unaware that Ken-oh's Invasion Division is already attacking the village.

23.TitleEnglish: Those Who Fear the Reaper! Listen to the Voice of Lin's Fiery Soul!
23.SummaryEnglish: Ken, Toki, and Mamiya follow a trail of huge hoof prints left by Ken-oh's horse. Meanwhile, Ken-oh's Invasion Squad forces the villagers to pay tribute to him or be sacrifice, but Rin decides to stand up to them.

24.TitleEnglish: Voices From Hell! Rei, Did You See the Death Omen Star?
24.SummaryEnglish: Rei arrives at Mamiya's village and rescues Rin. He confronts the leader of Ken-oh's Invasion Division, who tries to use Airi as a distraction. But Airi, spurred on by Rin's courage, gains the strength to fight for herself again. Rei goes on to defeat the Division leader, only to come face to face with none other than Ken-oh himself.

25.TitleEnglish: The South Star Waterfowl Fist's Dance of Death! I'll Give My Life for Love!
25.SummaryEnglish: Rei challenges Ken-oh, but proves to be no match against him and is mortally wounded. Kenshiro, unable to save Rei, challenges Raoh himself, but even he too has difficulty defeating him.

26.TitleEnglish: Explosion of Secret Techniques! Beyond Hatred Is the Fate for the Brothers of the North Star.
26.SummaryEnglish: Toki arrives at the village and interferes with Ken and Raoh's fight, revealing that Raoh was responsible for the death of their adoptive father Ryuken. Believing that Ken is not ready to fight Raoh, he paralyzes Ken and challenges Raoh himself.

27.TitleEnglish: The Greatest Battle in History. Raoh vs. Ken! You're the One to Die!
27.SummaryEnglish: Raoh gains the upper hand on Toki, but Ken breaks free of Toki's pressure point and challenges Raoh again. The two fight each to the point where they're both too wounded to continue, ending the battle in a stalemate.

28.TitleEnglish: 72 Hours to Live! The Death Omen Star Drags Rei In!
28.SummaryEnglish: As a result of his injury, Rei is left with only three days to live and symptoms of disfigurement are starting to show. Mamiya ventures into Medicine City by herself to search for a medicine to ease Rei's pain.

29.TitleEnglish: Fate Without Tomorrow! And Yet, a Woman Believes in Love!!
29.SummaryEnglish: Mamiya is captured by Galf, the ruler of Medicine City. Ken and Rei rescue her, only to discover the "UD" mark tattooed behind her shoulder.

30.TitleEnglish: Yuda of the South Star Six Sacred Fists! I'm the Most Beautiful!!
30.SummaryEnglish: Ken and Rei learn that Mamiya was once kidnapped by a man named Yuda, who also murdered her parents. Rei reveals that Yuda is in fact, one of the Six Sacred Fists of Nanto along with Rei himself and the already deceased Shin. Ken and Rei head to Yuda's castle to confront him, but they only find his lieutenant Dagarl, who tells that Yuda has gone to the village of Blue Town.

31.TitleEnglish: The Death Omen Star Looms! Rei! How Cruel Time Passes By!
31.SummaryEnglish: Ken and Rei arrive at Blue Town assist a young group of rebels seeking to rescue their female friends and family from Yuda. However, the "Yuda" at Blue Town is actually a decoy. The real Yuda is revealed to had been hiding in his castle all along.

32.TitleEnglish: Beloved Mamiya! The Death Omen Star Lurks Behind the Sparkle in Your Eyes!!
32.SummaryEnglish: Ken and Rei return to Mamiya's village, with Rei at the verge of death. Toki offers to push a pressure point on Rei's body that will grant strength and increase his lifespan for another day, but the expense of great pain.

33.TitleEnglish: Rei, Are You on Your Way to Death? A Man Is Beautiful Than Ever!!
33.SummaryEnglish: Yuda and his gang arrive at the village and takes Mamiya captive in order to challenge Rei to a match. Yuda reveals that he has harbored resentment towards Rei ever since they've trained together, due to the fact that Rei's graceful Nanto Suichōken is more admired than Yuda's own Nanto Kōkakuken style.

34.TitleEnglish: Beautiful Warriors, Rei vs. Yuda! A Man's Passage Needs No Tears!!
34.SummaryEnglish: Yuda's henchmen causes a flood in the village that makes Rei stuck to the ground, giving Yuda a slight upper hand. However, Rei overcomes this and defeats Yuda with his ultimate technique. Yuda accepts his defeat and recognizes Rei as a stronger and more beautiful man. Yuda dies, but Rei himself does not have much time to live either.

35.TitleEnglish: End of Part Two: Farewell, Rei! Your Heroic Legend Will Be Told Throughout the Ages!
35.SummaryEnglish: In his last moment of life, Rei secludes himself from his family and friends and reminisces his adventures with Ken and co. while awaiting death. After dying, Ken cremates his body by burning the cabin with his body still in it.

3.SummaryEnglish: Stagione 3 di Ken il guerriero in anteprima dal 9 gennaio, 1986.

1.TitleEnglish: Beginning of Part Three: Supreme Rule in Turbulence! As the South Star Fades, the North Star Appears!!
1.SummaryEnglish: With Rei now dead, only three of the Six Sacred Fists of Nanto remain and Kenshiro sets off to find the remaining ones. One of them, a man named Souther, has proclaimed himself to the "Holy Emperor" and seeks to conquer the world as well.

2.TitleEnglish: The Star of Darkness Engulfs the Heavens! Time Evolves Beyond the Deathmatch!
2.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro meets a blind martial artist rebelling against Souther named Shu, who is also one of the Six Sacred Fists.

3.TitleEnglish: Shu of the South Star White Heron Fist! What Will You Witness in the End of the Century?!
3.SummaryEnglish: While saving a group of children slaves from Souther's troops, Ken remembers that he once fought Shu in the past, back when he was still a child.

4.TitleEnglish: Love on the Battlefield! Must This Age Tear Love Apart!?
4.SummaryEnglish: When a young member of Shu's resistance is killed, Ken must protect the fallen rebel's fiancee from Garzus, one of Souther's men.

5.TitleEnglish: I Am Souther, the Holy Emperor! I Disallow Love and Compassion!!
5.SummaryEnglish: Ken finally comes face to face with Souther. However, the Holy Emperor stands immune to Ken's Hokuto Shinken techniques.

6.TitleEnglish: A Young Hero Challenges His Fate! A Scream From Your Soul Shall Move the Heavens!!
6.SummaryEnglish: Defeated by Souther, Ken is captured so he could be used as a sacrifice for the completion of Souther's Holy Cross Mausoleum. However, Shu's young son Shiva sets off to infiltrate Souther's lair and save Ken, even at the cost of his own life.

7.TitleEnglish: A Bloody Battle, Shu vs. Souther! Love, Drowned in the Tears of the Star of Benevolence!!
7.SummaryEnglish: Ken is rescued, but at the tragic cost of Shiva's life. However, with Ken still injured from his fight with Souther, Shu decides to hide him and challenges Souther for the sake of his people.

8.TitleEnglish: The Bloody Cross Mausoleum! Shu! I'll Catch Your Tears With My Heart!!
8.SummaryEnglish: Shu is defeated by Souther and is forced to carry the stone that will serve as the summit of Souther's pyramid. Sensing Shu's struggle, Ken awakens and quickly regains his full strength.

9.TitleEnglish: Run Kenshiro! Another Comrade is About to Die!!
9.SummaryEnglish: Ken arrives at the Holy Cross Mausoleum and witnesses Shu's public execution at the hands of Souther. But before dying, Shu miraculously recovers his eyesight and sees the now grown Kenshiro before dying. Toki and Raoh also arrive at the scene to witness Ken's fight with Southeer.

10.TitleEnglish: Clash of the Polar Stars, Ken vs. Souther! My Star Is the Only Protector of Heaven!!
10.SummaryEnglish: Before accepting Kenshiro's challenge, Souther recites his tragic childhood and his motive for building the Holy Cross Mausoleum. Ken fights Souther again and struggles, until he finally fathoms the secret behind Souther's invulnerability.

11.TitleEnglish: Souther, The Despondent Holy Emperor! You Are Weary From Love!!
11.SummaryEnglish: With Ken aware of his weakness, Souther uses the ultimate technique of his Nanto Hō-ōken style as a last resort. The stage is set for the final round.

12.TitleEnglish: Critical Times of the North Star! Three Brothers of Fate Are on the Move!!
12.SummaryEnglish: Raoh regains his full strength and seeks Koryu, Ryuken's former rival, to test his power, while Toki, who was once willing to settle using his skills to heal the weak, has regained his determination as a martial artist.

13.TitleEnglish: The Other Divine Fist of the North Star! Drive Raoh to Oblivion!!
13.SummaryEnglish: Raoh challenges Koryu to battle to gauge his strength. Toki learns of Raoh's recovery and is determined to stop him at any cost.

14.TitleEnglish: The Secret Origin Revealed! The Heaven Prefers Tragedy!!
14.SummaryEnglish: Toki and Raoh's past is revealed as the two are reunited at the place where they were adopted by Ryuken.

15.TitleEnglish: Farewell, Toki! A Man Only Cries Once!!
15.SummaryEnglish: Determined to fulfill the childhood promise he made to his brother, Toki fights Raoh to a death match.

16.TitleEnglish: Ryuga of Sirius! I'll Seize the Rainbow in the Tempest!!
16.SummaryEnglish: Ken meets Ryuga, a martial artist and servant of Raoh whose astrological sign is a solitary star that is neither, part of Hokuto and Nanto.

17.TitleEnglish: A Wolf Runs on the Horizon! There Lies the End of Love and Hatred!!
17.SummaryEnglish: Ryuga, who swore royalty to Raoh and his tyranny, witnesses Kenshiro's compassion to others and is determined to find out which of the two brothers is more to fit to lead the world.

18.TitleEnglish: Forgive Me, My Sister! My Destiny Is to Clash With the North Star!!
18.SummaryEnglish: Ryuga challenges Kenshiro to test his strength, but Ken is unwilling to fight back.

19.TitleEnglish: An Iron Fist for the Roaring Wolf! Toki Is in Danger!!
19.SummaryEnglish: Determined to challenge Ken, Ryuga decides to lure Ken to his lair by kidnapping and wounding Toki.

20.TitleEnglish: Conclusion of Part Three: Let the New Age Awaken! The Wolf's Howl Moves the Heavens!!
20.SummaryEnglish: Ken sets foot into Ryuga's lair, determined to save Toki and finish his battle with Ryuga once and for all.

21.TitleEnglish: Shin of the South Star! You Risked Your Life for a Love Unrequited!!
21.SummaryEnglish: While cremating Toki's and Ryuga's remains, Ken remembers where it all began - with his old nemesis Shin, the man who engraved the seven scars on his chest and once kidnapped his beloved Yuria.

22.TitleEnglish: Rei of the South Star Waterfowl Fist! There Was a Man Who Died for His Friends!!
22.SummaryEnglish: Ken reflects on the life of his ally Rei, the man who sacrificed his life to save Ken.

23.TitleEnglish: Yuda of the South Star Crimson Crane Fist! His Beautiful Smile Calls for Tragedy!!
23.SummaryEnglish: Ken remembers Rei's battle against his rival Yuda, the man who once tormented Rei's beloved Mamiya.

24.TitleEnglish: Shu of the South Star White Heron Fist! The Heavens Only Bestow Cruel Destinies!
24.SummaryEnglish: Ken remembers Shu, a selfless man whose encounter with a young Kenshiro led him to his destiny.

25.TitleEnglish: Holy Emperor Souther! Your Deep Affection Consumes You In Love!!
25.SummaryEnglish: Ken remembers Souther, the strongest of the Nanto Seiken masters.

4.SummaryEnglish: Stagione 4 di Ken il guerriero in anteprima dal 7 agosto, 1986.

1.TitleEnglish: Part Four: The Final Chapter – Raoh Must Die! The Legend Turns to Terror!!
1.SummaryEnglish: Ken, Bato, and Rin continue their journey and find themselves at a village ruled by a follower of Ken-oh named Bugal, a neat freak who has monopolized the town's water supply for himself.

2.TitleEnglish: The South Star Strikes Back! The Wind Brigade Protects the Last General of the South Star!!
2.SummaryEnglish: While infiltrating one of Ken-oh's enlistment groups, Kenshiro confronts Glen the Killer Machine, a man raised to be a fighting machine. After Ken defeats Glen, Glen renounces his evil ways only to be betrayed by his master David, who has his men to kill Glen. David and his men flee from Ken, only to be slaughtered by Hyui and his Wind Brigade, who then challenges Ken to a sparring match.

3.TitleEnglish: Prelude to a Deathmatch! The Screams of Hyui of the Wind Echoes in the Heaven!!
3.SummaryEnglish: Hyui of the Wind launches a war campaign against Ken-oh and his troops on behalf of the Last General of the South Star and attempts to lure Ken-oh to him by wiping several of troops. Hyui is eventually found by Ken-oh and is defeated with a single strike.

4.TitleEnglish: The Burning Crimson Brigade! Shuren Is Drenched in Tears of Flame!!
4.SummaryEnglish: Vowing to avenge his brother star's death, Shuren lights a funeral pyre for Hyui and burns down his home castle, leaving him and his Crimson Army with no home to return to, while Kenshiro goes after Morgan, the chief of Ken-oh's vanguard force, for destroying Bato's buggy.

5.TitleEnglish: Five Chariot Stars in Danger! Raoh Has Finally Pierced Through the Flames!!
5.SummaryEnglish: Shuren of the Flames confront Ken-oh and uses the Five Chariots Passionate Flame Fist as he attempts to sacrifice his life to defeat Ken-oh by engulfing himself in flames. Kenshiro, Bato, and Rin befriend a gentle giant named Fudo after saving him from a group of Ken-oh's soldiers

6.TitleEnglish: The Five Chariot Stars Approaches Kenshiro! Who Are You, Fudo?!
6.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro fights a gang of four led by a man named Gokure, which causes Fudo to reveal his true nature as one of the Five Chariots sent on behalf of the Last General of the South Star.

7.TitleEnglish: The Crisis Is Near! Ken, Destiny Awaits at the Capital of the South Star!!
7.SummaryEnglish: Rihaku's agents attempt to persuade Juza, the only member of the Five Chariots that has not joined the Last General's cause, while Kenshiro and friends face a group of bandits pretending to be Ken-oh's men.

8.TitleEnglish: I Am Juza of the Clouds! I Shall Move With the Flow of Time!!
8.SummaryEnglish: Juza demonstrates his self-taught style against Gelza, a bandit that has come to his castle reclaim his "women" from Juza, while Kenshiro faces Ken-oh's pike brigade led by Yakob.

9.TitleEnglish: The Clouds Remain! The Masked General Is Finally Revealed!!
9.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro and friends find themselves at a village ruled by Dolfi, who oppresses his residents by giving them a false sense of democracy, while Juza is drugged and taken to the Last General's castle, who reveals her identity to Juza.

10.TitleEnglish: Juza of the Clouds Resurrects! I Have No Fear for Raoh!!
10.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro and his friends attempt to find a way to cross a bridge that is under the surveillance of one of Ken-oh's men, while Juza and his gang intercepts Ken-oh and his men

11.TitleEnglish: Showdown, Juza vs. Raoh! The Legend of the Invincible Comes to an End!!
11.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro faces Jenomy, an assassin who seeks to make Kenshiro his 10,000th victim, while Juza flees from battle by hijacking Raoh's steed Kokuoh-Go.

12.TitleEnglish: Fudo in Peril! Hurry, Ken, a Man Must Not Abandon His Friends!!
12.SummaryEnglish: Hilka kidnaps two of Fudo's adopted children, Danji and Jiro, in an attempt to sidetrack Kenshiro and his friends from reaching the Capital of the South Star before Raoh.

13.TitleEnglish: Treacherous Quicksand! Will the Hand of Salvation Reach Fudo?
13.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro is forced to make a choice between going to the Capital of the South Star while he is still ahead of Raoh or retreat to help Fudo rescue Danji and Jiro from the quicksand they were thrown into by Hilka.

14.TitleEnglish: Juza Falls! I'll Give My Life to Protect the Woman I Love!!
14.SummaryEnglish: Juza returns to Raoh to continue their battle where they left off, while Kenshiro is told by Fudo the true identity of the Last General of the South Star.

15.TitleEnglish: Farewell Yuria! A Strong Man Will Not Speak of Love, Even in Death!!
15.SummaryEnglish: Having learned that Yuria survived the destruction of Southern Cross thanks to the interference of the Five Chariots, Kenshiro rushes to the Capital of the South Star with greater urgency, while Raoh attempts to interrogate Juza to learn the identity of the Last General.

16.TitleEnglish: The Capital of the South Star Trembles! The Two Brothers of the North Star Finally Arrive!!
16.SummaryEnglish: While Kenshiro and Raoh are mutually approaching the Capital of the South Star, Rihaku tells his daughter Toh about Hokuto Shinken and the history between Kenshiro and Raoh.

17.TitleEnglish: Sadness of the Five Chariot Stars! Love and Destiny Looms Over the Woman!!
17.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro faces Ken-oh's shadow brigade, while Raoh enters Yuria's castle first, but instead of finding the Last General, he encounters Toh, who is masquerading as Yuria.

18.TitleEnglish: The Ultimate Secret Technique, Unconscious Transmigration! Raoh, I've Got You Now!!
18.SummaryEnglish: Yuria attempts to escape from her castle in order to be reunited with Kenshiro, while Rihaku challenges Raoh. However, Kenshiro refuses to see Yuria yet, feeling that her life might be in danger as long as Raoh lives.

19.TitleEnglish: Is It the End of Raoh and His Ambitions? The Heaven Hesitates Once Again!!
19.SummaryEnglish: Raoh is overwhelmed by Kenshiro's newly discovered technique of Musō Tensei and is willing to accept death, until one of Rihaku's booby-traps is accidentally triggered and the floor collapses. Raoh recovers from the wreckage and manages to stumble into Yuria and then rides off with her.

20.TitleEnglish: Raoh, the Confused Giant! I Don't Believe in Love!!
20.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro continues to chase after Raoh and rescue Yuria, even with his eyes wounded, while Raoh, having been haunted by nightmares of his near-defeat against Kenshiro, seeks to conquer his fear.

21.TitleEnglish: A Challenge From the Devil! Fudo, Be the Demon for Those You Love!!
21.SummaryEnglish: Fudo, who was once a terrifying bandit until he learned the value of life from a young Yuria, is challenged by Raoh, who seeks to conquer his fears by defeating the only other man whom he ever feared.

22.TitleEnglish: Fudo, the Gentle Warrior! His Tears Awaken a Fiery Soul!!
22.SummaryEnglish: Raoh appears to have gained the upper hand against Fudo, but Fudo's courage and paternal love allows him to persist further in battle, causing Raoh to instinctively retreat and Raoh's army to interfere.

23.TitleEnglish: Protect the Merciful Mother of the South Star! Even if It's the End of the Five Chariots!!
23.SummaryEnglish: At Fudo's funeral pyre, the sole surviving member of the Five Chariots, Rihaku, remembers the sacrifices of his comrades as they fought to protect Yuria from Raoh.

24.TitleEnglish: Raoh, Shaken by a Nightmare! Yuria, You Are the Only One!!
24.SummaryEnglish: The men of Ken-oh's army are demoralized as news spread of Raoh's apparent defeat after his fight with Fudo. Raoh, realizing that only those who understand sorrow can achieve to master Unconscious Transmigration, decides to sacrifice Yuria for his final battle against Kenshiro.

25.TitleEnglish: Showdown at the North Star Mind and Body Training Ground! No One Can Stop Them Now!!
25.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro is taken by Kokuoh-Go to the North Star Mind and Body Training Ground for his final battle against Raoh, as Raoh reveals that he too has mastered the Unconscious Transmigration.

26.TitleEnglish: Farewell, Brothers of the North Star! They're Beyond Love and Sorrow!!
26.SummaryEnglish: The final battle between Kenshiro and Raoh reaches its conclusion, as the two brothers exchange their final blows.

27.TitleEnglish: Conclusion of the Final Chapter: Now Revealed! The 2,000 Year History of the North Star!!
27.SummaryEnglish: A recap of Kenshiro's history from the day he first met Yuria as a child at the North Star Mind and Body Training Ground to his final battle against his eldest brother Raoh.

5.SummaryEnglish: Stagione 5 di Ken il guerriero in anteprima dal 12 marzo, 1987.

1.TitleEnglish: The Past is Gone. The Dawn of the New Age!!
1.SummaryEnglish: Years has passed since Kenshiro disappeared following his final battle with Raoh and in the years since he's been gone, the Army of the Celestial Emperor has began to expand their territory through threat and oppression. Bat and Lin, Kenshiro's former companions, are now grown up and are leading a resistance movement known as the North Star Army.

2.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious drifter wanders into a town where the remnants of the Red Dragon Party, a resistance movement that once opposed the Celestial Emperor's army in the past.

3.TitleEnglish: The Savior Comes From the North!!
3.SummaryEnglish: An innocent woman is mistaken for Lin and is sentenced for public execution by General Bask in an attempt to demoralize the North Star Army. The real Bat and Lin attempt to risk their lives until a familiar face arrives to intervene.

4.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Bounty Hunter, Ein! Kenshiro's Head is Mine!!
4.SummaryEnglish: After being reunited with Bat and Lin, Kenshiro decides to join their cause, giving the North Star Army a needed boost in morale. A bounty is placed on Kenshiro's head and a man named Ein decides to take the offer.

5.TitleEnglish: Another Art of Assassination! The Imperial Fist of the Source Star is the Name!!
5.SummaryEnglish: As the North Star Army begins to liberate another one of the Celestial Emperor's areas, Kenshiro is forced to return to Mamiya's village to confront Solia of the Purple Light, a master of Gento Kōken who has been ordered to annihilate anyone associated with the Hokuto and Nanto schools.

6.TitleEnglish: Rage of the Celestial Emperor! Falco, Obliterate the North Star from Earth!!
6.SummaryEnglish: While attempting to catch up with Bat and Lin, Kenshiro is confronted by Shoki of the Red Light, a man who once helped Kenshiro in the past, while Bat and Lin lead a desperate battle against the Golden General Falco, the strongest of the Gento warriors.

7.TitleEnglish: The Wrath of the South Star! The Illustrious Harn Brothers!
7.SummaryEnglish: Just when Falco is about to execute Lin in front of her supporters, Falco is challenged to combat by the Harn Brothers, Haz and Gil, who are seeking revenge against Falco for killing most of the Nanto Seiken masters, while Ein tries to lure Kenshiro to his traps.

8.TitleEnglish: Ein in Danger! Hands of Evil Reach for His Love!!
8.SummaryEnglish: After Ein decides to switch sides and join the North Star Army, his former recruiter Beron decides to take revenge by kidnapping his "little lady", Asuka.

9.TitleEnglish: Falco, the Brave General of the Source Star! There Lies the Shadow of Raoh...
9.SummaryEnglish: As Kenshiro and the North Star Army approaches the Imperial Capital, Shoki of the Red Light decides to revolt against the Viceroy Jakoh, who is holding the Celestial Emperor hostage and forcing Falco to do his evil bidding.

10.TitleEnglish: The Emperor's Cries Echoes Through the Imperial Capital. Falco, Where Have You Gone?
10.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro confronts the renegade Gento warrior Boltz of the Blue Light, while Falco hands out a detonator to his lover Myu, which is triggered to destroy the foundation of the Imperial Capital, in case he loses to Kenshiro.

11.TitleEnglish: The Celestial Emperor is Finally Revealed!
11.SummaryEnglish: Lin enters the Imperial Capital along with Bat and Lin, sensing that the Celestial Emperor is calling out for her, while Kenshiro and Falco begins their battle.

12.TitleEnglish: An Elegy for Ein! Die Bravely Than Live Without Honor!
12.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro and Falco, both much worse for wear, are put in dire peril by Jakoh's cowardly schemes. Having already sustained heavy damage all over, both men come under fire from Jakoh's gigantic spears! Lin's group desperately seeks to escape from their cave quickly in order to tell Falco and Kenshiro that they have no more reason to fight. Ein hammers into an iron stake with his fist until breaking through to a water vein, and the underground water pressure lets them escape. The punch he stakes his life on finally creates a miracle!

13.TitleEnglish: The Fall of the Imperial Capital! Jakoh, You Can Dream in Hell!!
13.SummaryEnglish: Lin and her group manage to escape from Jakoh's underground dungeon, but at the expense of Ein's life. With the Celestial Empress Lui now free, Jakoh loses his hold on Falco and begins to flee for his life.

6.SummaryEnglish: Stagione 6 di Ken il guerriero in anteprima dal 16 luglio, 1987.

1.TitleEnglish: The Ordeal Never Ends! Kenshiro Crosses the Ocean!!
1.SummaryEnglish: Lin is taken to a land beyond the Sea of Dead, "The Land of the Asura." In this land where might determines everything, there exists a style called the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist. Kenshiro, crossing the sea in a pirate ship, learns that the ship's captain, the one-eyed, one-armed, one-legged Akashachi, once raided the Land of Asura, but was forced to flee and left his son behind. Upon arriving at the Land of the Asura, the first thing he sees is Falco, collapsed and gravely wounded by an Asura.

2.TitleEnglish: What Awaits on the Continent of Darkness? There Lies the Legendary Land of Asura!!
2.SummaryEnglish: Falco was defeated by a nameless Asura due to losing his artificial leg in the middle of battle. For the sake of his honor, Falco challenges the Asura to a rematch. To deal with the Asura, who burrows underground, Falco uses the Ruinous Freezing Yellow Threat Stance to freeze the surface of the ground, then waits for the Asura to pop up. With Falco throwing himself into the fight fully ready to die, can his Imperial Fist of the Source Star take down the Asura...!?

3.TitleEnglish: Good or Evil? The Mysterious North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist Appears!!
3.SummaryEnglish: Alph of the Hourglass, an Asura permitted to bear a name, won a battle between Asuras, and in doing so won the right to take Lin. He is charged with eliminating Kenshiro, and uses his poison cape to paralyze Kenshiro and pummel him with attacks. However, the one who lost when two minutes pass turns out to be Alph. Meanwhile, Lin is taken away by Shachi, a wielder of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist.

4.TitleEnglish: Love is Preached in the Century's End! Her Name is Leia!!
4.SummaryEnglish: Shachi is a wielder of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist. His goal is to overthrow the three generals of Asura who rule the Land of Asura. Meanwhile, Kenshiro meets Shachi's former lover, Leia, who tells him to kill Shachi, now steeped in evil. Shachi is stopped during his pursuit. In a fight between Kaizel, who can steal a man's insides without damaging his exterior, and Shachi, what will the outcome be!?

5.TitleEnglish: The General of Asura, Han! The Man Who Stains White Snow into Crimson!!
5.SummaryEnglish: Shachi takes Lin to general of Aura Han's castle, seeking to use Kenshiro to wear down Han for an easy defeat. In the guise of a rag, Shachi offers Lin up to Han as a pretense to get close to him. Han already sees through Shachi's disguise, and the two quickly resort to battle, though Shachi opts to make a hasty retreat after confirming Han's strength for himself. Meanwhile, Kenshiro is already inside Han's castle...

6.TitleEnglish: The Legend of the Savior of Asura! His Name is Raoh!!
6.SummaryEnglish: While watching Kenshiro and Han's fight from the sidelines, Shachi reflects upon how in this land, one must be strong to survive. After apprenticing himself to an old master of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, Shachi decided to become a devil, in direct opposition to his lover Leia, who preached the value of love. He refined his skill under Jukei, who claimed that one day a savior would bring change to this land. But the name of the savior Jukei spoke of turns out to be Raoh!

7.TitleEnglish: Kenshiro's Secret is Revealed! The Land of Asura is His Motherland!!
7.SummaryEnglish: Due to Shachi's scheming, Kenshiro's presence becomes known all across the land as "Raoh's invasion." The Asuras cower, and the people eagerly await liberation. Relieved to hear this, Jukei tells of his past... He taught the three generals of Asura the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, and led to the creation of the Land of Asura. Furthermore, this Land of Asura was Raoh and Kenshiro's birthplace...

8.TitleEnglish: A Cruel Prophecy! Kenshiro, You Cannot Be the Savior!
8.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro is perplexed by Han's dying words, that he can never become a savior. But the Land of Asura remains unaware of the fact that the news of Raoh's coming is wrong, and chaos persists. In the midst of this, a villager named Kosem who eagerly awaits Raoh's coming decides to start an all-out revolt. But the Asuras realize that Raoh will not come, and the villagers are massacred at their hands. Arriving during this, Kenshiro hears someone demanding to know why he is here and not Raoh...

9.TitleEnglish: Rock, The Hero on Horseback! I Don't Believe in Kenshiro!!
9.SummaryEnglish: With Raoh's legend in shambles, tyranny and brutal suppression of revolts has grown worse than ever. Kosem's son Rock, believing Raoh would come, returned to his village with the intent of joining the uprising, but is horror-stricken upon finding out about the death of his father and the collapse of Raoh's legend. Rock decides to carry on Raoh's legend himself, and gathers fellow soldiers to form Raoh's Army. They boldly dare to challenge the Asuras, but...

10.TitleEnglish: Men Beyond Reasons! The Band of Seven Attacks Kenshiro!!
10.SummaryEnglish: Seeking to become the third general of Asura, Gammon, Asura of Sasori, takes Rock's group hostage in order to ambush Kenshiro. Kenshiro sees the suffering in Rock's eyes, and springs the trap deliberately in order to draw the real culprit, Gammon, out.

11.TitleEnglish: Rock's Message of Death! Kenshiro, Hang on to Your Friend's Life!!
11.SummaryEnglish: With the death of the third general of Asura, Han, the second general of Asura Hyoh departs in person, at the head of his army, to suppress Kenshiro. Learning of the situation, the master of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, Jukei, shockingly claims that Kenshiro cannot win against Hyoh. Kenshiro is Hyoh's younger brother by blood, and furthermore, Hyoh has a hidden secret...!!

12.TitleEnglish: Announcing the Creator of the New Century! My Name is Demon Kaioh!!
12.SummaryEnglish: Jukei, master of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, awaits Hyoh, who is still in search of Kenshiro. Jukei, believing Kenshiro cannot win against Hyoh, risks his life to try and restore Hyoh's memories. Meanwhile, Shachi, in pursuit of his own ambition, hands Lin over to the first general, Kaioh. But Kaioh, after taking Lin to his castle, gives off an evil fighting spiritual energy, and declares himself the creator of the new century.

13.TitleEnglish: The Seal of the Devil! 2,000 Year Tragedy of the North Star is Revealed
13.SummaryEnglish: Jukei seeks to restore Hyoh's sealed-off memories, and draw out the "Key" to destroying the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, the primary thing Kenshiro would need to win against Kaioh. Kenshiro and Hyoh belong to the main family of the North Star, and Hyoh was the only person to learn the location of the hidden technique. But even after coming to terms with reality, no technique seems to be able to break the seal on his memories. Meanwhile, Kenshiro, in his quest to rescue Lin, sets foot in Kaioh's castle...

14.TitleEnglish: Little Brother Ken in Danger! Hyoh, Open Up Your Kind Soul!
14.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro loses badly to Kaioh. Even Ken's ultimate technique, the Unconcious Transmigration, doesn't seem to slow Kaioh down. Kaioh declares that the sealed memories which only Hyoh knows are the only key to defeating him in existence. Meanwhile, Jukei struggles to bring back the old, compassionate Hyoh, the one who thought strongly of his younger brother as a child, and stubbornly refused to ever divulge the location of the hidden technique. To do this, he stakes his own life upon hitting a destructive point: Jukei's ultimate destructive point. This goes beyond his expectations and drastically transfigures Hyoh's...

15.TitleEnglish: Kenshiro on the Execution Stand! The Heavens Unleash the God of the Sea!!
15.SummaryEnglish: Having lost to Kaioh, Kenshiro is cruelly crucified. Shachi watches protectively from the shadows, but then challenges Kaioh, who wields a superior North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, to a direct confrontation. However, Shachi doesn't stand a chance against him. Just as Kaioh is about to deliver the finishing blow to Shachi, Akashachi showers him in concentrated sulfuric acid, stalling him long enough to rescue Kenshiro and Shachi. Lin gets swept out of sight in the current... And Akashachi, while trying to finish Kaioh off, meets his end at Kaioh's hands.

16.TitleEnglish: Kaioh's Declaration of Victory! The Phantom of the North Star Attacks!!
16.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro bears heavy damage from his fight with Kaioh. Under the pretext of giving Akashachi a burial at sea, Shachi seeks to withdraw and give Kenshiro a chance to heal. Kaioh returns to prevent that, and as Shachi's group starts down the waterway, Kaioh once again appears before them! Is this the end of the line!? Shachi is ready to throw in the towel, but suddenly, Kaioh's evil fighting spiritual energy gets extinguished. Kenshiro, whose pulse should have stopped, stands before them...

17.TitleEnglish: A Destined Encounter for Hyoh and Ken! Hyoh Doesn't Yet Know About His Brother!!
17.SummaryEnglish: Shachi is determined to protect Kenshiro, whom he believes to be the savior. He continues his journey, disguising himself as a rag and hiding Kenshiro in a coffin. Kaioh is consumed with fear of Kenshiro's limitless potential, and instructs his henchmen to search for Lin. For her part, after getting swallowed by underground currents, Lin is rescued by Kaioh's younger sister, Sayaka. Meanwhile, heavily scarred by the killing of Jukei, Hyoh seeks out Sayaka to mend his wounds, but...

18.TitleEnglish: Kaioh's Evil Decision! Cold Blood Runs Through My Body!!
18.SummaryEnglish: Shachi finally brings Kenshiro to a safe haven. Around that time, Commander of Asura Kain, having received instructions to search for Shachi and Kenshiro, sets about his search in hopes of attaining the coveted position of third general. The cabin where Shachi arrived finally gets searched, but due to poor timing, the only one there is the cabin's elderly caretaker. Asura henchmen intrude inside... Meanwhile, in order to draw Hyoh to the dark world, Kaioh takes his own younger sister by blood, Sayaka.

19.TitleEnglish: Kenshiro's Challenge! I'll Never Be Defeated Twice!!
19.SummaryEnglish: Kaioh kills his own younger sister, Sayaka, and spreads word that Kenshiro is the one behind it. Hyoh is consumed by powerful hatred. Kaioh schemes to bring the main family of the North Star to an end. Right in the middle of the funeral for Sayaka being held in Kaioh's castle, an Asura named Gyoko's battle train crashes in. Gyoko, rolling in front of Kaioh, bears a message from Kenshiro: I am never defeated twice! Hyoh, believing that Kenshiro killed Sayaka, is consumed in powerful hatred upon hearing that, and takes his first step towards the dark world...

20.TitleEnglish: The Tyrant Hyoh and His Sorrowful Aide! Who Will Stop Him Now?!
20.SummaryEnglish: Having ventured into the dark world, Hyoh's personality becomes evil and twisted. Upon seeing how he had changed, his adoring, devoted Vice General Nagato is stricken with unbearable grief. Nagato encounters Shachi and Kenshiro, both heavily injured from fighting Kaioh. Despite their positions as enemies, Nagato senses something heart-stirring in Kenshiro's eyes, and hides the two of them in his house...

21.TitleEnglish: The Battle of the Blood Brothers! Tears Will Never Return to Hyoh!!
21.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro's group hears that Hyoh is exploiting villagers to bring back the birthplace of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, the Holy Temple of Asura, from the bottom of a swamp. Kenshiro faces off with Hyoh, who has gone there and turned into a demon. While Kenshiro senses that Hyoh is his elder brother, Hyoh's memories remain sealed and lost, and Hyoh, seeing Kenshiro only as Sayaka's murderer, is consumed anew with vengeance. When Kaioh hears reports of the fighting, he lets out resounding laughter at how smoothly things are going for him.

22.TitleEnglish: The North Star on the Brink of Death! Kaioh Reaches Out for the Celestial Emperor!!
22.SummaryEnglish: In the midst of Kenshiro and Hyoh's back-and-forth battle, when Kenshiro hits a pressure point, Hyoh uses an evil art to gouge out his own flesh where the pressure point is located. With the battle between Kenshiro and Hyoh, Kaioh is more confident than ever in the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist's new century. When he has Lin brought before him, Kaioh's real face surfaces amidst his evil fighting spiritual energy. His face bears an eerie resemblance to Raoh's... Of course it would - Kaioh is Raoh's older brother!

23.TitleEnglish: A Tearful Reunion of Brothers! Kenshiro, I've Been Waiting for You!!
23.SummaryEnglish: Hyoh's evil fighting spiritual energy has vanished! But his memories haven't completely returned. His mind clouded with memories of his childhood departure from Kenshiro, Hyoh turns his fist upon Kenshiro once more. Shachi senses danger and finally acts. As Kenshiro catches a glimpse of tears in Hyoh's eyes, his fist slackens, and to save him, he rushes Hyoh from behind! Then the defeated Hyoh says something unexpected...

24.TitleEnglish: Shachi's Battle for Love! Kaioh Will Ridicule It With Laughter!
24.SummaryEnglish: Hyoh regains his memories, and upon hearing of Hyoh's reconciliation with Kenshiro, Kaioh does a complete about-face. Heavy with anger towards Shachi at having made their reconciliation possible, Kaioh orders the Asuras to hunt Shachi down. Meanwhile, Hyoh has recovered from the worst of his injuries, and tells Kenshiro and Shachi that there is a hidden technique sealed within the Holy Temple of Asura, the sanctum of the main family of the North Star. Leia and Lin's love opens the way to the hidden technique's hiding place, and underground, under the watchful gaze of female visages, Kaioh and Shachi do battle...

25.TitleEnglish: The Fall of Shachi, Warrior of Love! Love is Everything, My Friends!!
25.SummaryEnglish: Shachi is believed to have already died fighting Kaioh to protect Leia. But the female visages in the Holy Temple of Asura create a mysterious resonance, and with tears in his eyes, Shachi rises again. Even as heavily overwhelmed as he had been, he launches a counterattack so ferocious that it even shocks Kaioh. It all comes from the power of love... Kaioh, now convinced that the main family's ultimate technique is love, seeks to prove the superiority of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist that he uses for his evil ultimate art.

26.TitleEnglish: Tragic Victim of Love! Kaioh's Foundation of Evil!!
26.SummaryEnglish: The place Kaioh chooses for a showdown is the Swamp of Demon, a place teeming with evil fighting spiritual energy, and the place where his evil began. Leia gives Kenshiro Shachi's protector as a memento, and Kenshiro sets foot into the swamp alone. There, the tragic past of Kaioh and Raoh's mother, and Kenshiro and Hyoh's mother, is revealed! Then, right before the battle, Kaioh hits a destructive point on Lin! What terrifying effect will it have...!?

27.TitleEnglish: Kaioh's Disgraceful Past! The Heaven Recreates Lin's Destiny!!
27.SummaryEnglish: Because of the destructive point that Kaioh hit, when Lin wakes up, she may very well fall in love with the first person she sees, regardless of whom it may be. Kenshiro, shaking with rage, fights with Kaioh. Realizing Lin's peril, Hyoh once more overstrains his heavily injured body to save Lin... What is the disgrace Hyoh speaks of, that twisted Kaioh as a child!? And what of the feelings Raoh told Kenshiro that he had towards Kaioh!?

28.TitleEnglish: The Final Chapter: The Last Three Episodes! Here is the 2,000 Year-old History of the Main Family of the North Star!!
28.SummaryEnglish: Kenshiro and Kaioh's deadly struggle continues. But Kenshiro is put in dire peril when his body becomes paralyzed by gas in a cave beneath the Swamp of Demon. Meanwhile, learning of the destructive point hit on Lin, the Asuras go after her. Danger draws closer and closer to Lin as she begins to regain consciousness. Will Hyoh make it in time!? In the midst of battle, Kenshiro learns that Kaioh also bears the blood of the main family of the North Star. There is a story behind that, a tragic tale about the main family of the North Star from before the Divine Fist of the North Star was founded...

29.TitleEnglish: Prologue to the Final Episode! A Third Man Appears to Determine Lin's Fate!!
29.SummaryEnglish: Kaioh's fist no longer has any effect on Kenshiro. In contrast to the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, whose style has already been perfected and has no further progress, the Divine Fist of the North Star is a style which continues to constantly evolve on the battlefield. Thus, by using the hidden technique Kenshiro acquired, the art to deflect the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, it is rendered completely ineffective. Seeing his chances of winning slipping away, Kaioh casts off the armor he wears to contain his evil fighting spiritual energy, and goes all-out in a last ditch battle! Meanwhile, Black Yaksha meets his end protecting Lin, and Hyoh is in dire peril once more! But then, some unexpected backup arrives...!!

30.TitleEnglish: Fist of the North Star 2: The Final Episode – Farewell, Kenshiro!! Farewell, Divine Fist of the North Star!!
30.SummaryEnglish: After saving Lin and Hyoh, the North Star Army rushes towards the place where the ferocious battle between Kenshiro and Kaioh is unfolding. Kaioh has cast off his armor and fights desperately using his evil fighting spiritual energy, while Kenshiro shows that he has the advantage by far. But Kaioh, who can't even hurt him with his evil fighting spiritual energy now, borrows his mother's strength for one final blow! Kaioh gets sent flying into the sky by a geyser erupting from beneath the grave, and when he swoops down upon Kenshiro, Kenshiro's fist slams into him! Can the history of fate that has laste since the era of the main family of the North Star be put to rest, at long last!?
